info.name: Stylus Dark - ShadowFox
info.description:
This theme is specifically designed to match the dark mode used by Firefox's inspector and browser toolbox (background colors, text colors in the editor, fonts etc.).  Additionally, it is meant to compliment [ShadowFox](https://github.com/overdodactyl/ShadowFox) - a universal dark theme for Firefox.   

Hosted on GitHub (please submit any issues there): https://github.com/overdodactyl/Stylus-Dark
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:

09/14/2018: Selector backgrounds

03/13/2018: Fix inline style search background

01/27/2017: Style code mirror suggestions

data.title: Nice blend with dark breeze style
Good style but need a bit improvements
